greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle built from partial sums of Catalan numbers A000108 multiplied by powers.
comment: The column sequences (without leading zeros) begin with A000012 (powers of 1), A112705 (partial sums Catalan), A112696-A112704, for m=0..10.
formula: G.f. for column m>=0 (without leading zeros): c(m*x)/(1-x), where c(x):=(1-sqrt(1-4*x))/(2*x) is the o.g.f. of Catalan numbers A000108.
program: (PARI) t(n, m) = if (m==0, 1, if (n==m, 1, sum(kk=0, n-m, m^kk*binomial(2*kk, kk)/(kk+1))));
tabl(nn) = {for (n=0, nn, for (m=0, n, print1(t(n, m), ", ");); print(););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Nov 25 2015
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Oct 31 2005
